name: 【﻿ＬＯＮＥ ＴＯＵＲ】
description:
L0NE T0UR is an indie developed platformer featuring a single girl left in an empty and cold world. Why do you keep moving forward? What lies at the end of your journey? What is it that you're even searching for? You may not know what's ahead, but please continue to move forward.

Features:

-Platforming through a desolate sci-fi world

-Dashing through into the city even if there isn't a platform in sight

-A mystery that needs to be solved
